desc: Bright Nutrition, Inc. Chicago is proud to offer the finest quality dietary supplements for optimum health and well-being since 2003. Our affordable, safe, and effective natural remedies have been meticulously chosen through a decade of extensive research, testing, and ongoing review.

layout.text: Bright Nutrition, Inc. is proud to offer the finest quality dietary supplements for optimum health and well-being since 2003. We specialize in select health essentials, functional herbal formulas, and rare and unique specialty supplements. Our affordable, safe, and effective natural remedies have been meticulously chosen through a decade of extensive research, testing, and ongoing review. With our unique array of formulas suited for specific health needs and unsurpassed quality – you can be confident we have your health covered!
